Name: Funerary Panel with Braided Ornamentation
Description: The oblong stela, an upright stone with a sculpted surface, is divided into two sections by braided ornamentation around the edges. The upper section is a square surrounding a circular ornament containing a flower surrounded by dots. The lower section is a rectangle with an inscription of five lines at the top. On the bottom of the lower section, a projecting semicircular ornament containing a flower is surrounded by a braid bordered with two lines.
